content: the daisy stitch better known as the star stitch is definitely the star of the show in this beautiful elegant cowl the field of daisies cowl is a stylish accessory that can add a touch of sophistication to any outfit the gentle drape of the cowl provides just enough coverage when the weather is bit cool made with just one hank of madelinetosh tosh dk the field of daisies cowl becomes a decadent indulgence however choose any dk weight yarn to make the field of daisies cowl a reflection of your unique style the crochet daisy stitch is a simple mindful 2-row stitch repeat once you learn where to insert your hook to pull up the loops for the star stitch you ll find it s a repetitive stitch to work skill level advanced beginner stitches used chain single_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch the pdf includes detailed instructions on how to work the star stitch at all points in the round plus a tutorial is available on the blog with step by step pictures you can find it here https //www madamestitch com/how-to-crochet-star-stitch-in-rounds/
